document_data.mainbody: '''Beetroots''' was as type of root vegetable produced by the beet plant, common throughout [[Faerûn]].
document_data.Description:
The vegetable was a sweet and nutritious root of blood-red color.
*Sugar beets: the species of beets used to produce [[sugar]] and often used to make [[candy]] and potables.

Availability.Trade:
*[[Chessenta]]-grown produce, including beets, were sold across the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] and during especially harvest-rich years, sent via [[Shar]]-traversing caravans and into the ports of the [[Lake of Steam]].
*[[Mistledale]]'s [[Ashabenford]] was a trade town that allowed farmers from across the [[Dalelands]] to sell their produce of beets, hay, vegetables, [[potato]]es, and grains to [[Cormyr]] and the [[Moonsea]].

document_data.Usage:
*Beetroot relish was sold through [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]] for five [[silver piece]]s per quart.
*[[Blood-drops]], a food made of thinly sliced and fried beets, covered with sweet or spicy dusting.
*Pickled beets were a staple of inns in the [[West Faerûn]], between [[Dragonspear Castle]] and Daggerford, as well as Red Larch's markets. A quart was sold for four silver pieces.
*[[Spruce beer]] of the human tribes of High Moor was brewed with sugar extracted from wild sugar beets, [[spruce]] tree, and [[molasses]].
